Author: 14inchgap
Text: Thanks. I've been doing this for so long yet it gets me all paranoid every time anyway. Makes total sense because I saw my Dr yesterday and he told me I need to eat more salt, so I had some soup.  Still a total bummer lol.

Author: Azaryxe
Text: If you take in more sodium than water, you're gonna retain. Review your drinking habits, you might find you had more fluids when consuming a larger amount of calories which explains the backward loss. There are also many other factors too, but I don't have time to get into that (my break is over). You're not going crazy.
